accessibility.text: To avoid a drop in real salary, the nominal salary must increase by inflation
Labor Contract: “Employer will increase workers’ salaries by CPI Inflation”
Labor Contract: “Employer will increase workers’ salaries by CPI Inflation”
Salaries must increase by 233% to “compensate workers for the increase in prices”
Labor Contract: “Employer will increase workers’ salaries by CPI Inflation”
Salaries must increase by 233% to “compensate workers for the increase in prices”
Labor Contract: “Employer will increase workers’ salaries by CPI Inflation”
Workers substituted high priced goods and did not suffer a 233% increase in prices
